Content_wSideColumn.Name: Travel Information
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Youth Programs: Travel Info
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: This page displays the needed travel information such as Parking, arrival time and check in departure and BYU-Idaho Shuttle services.

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Arrival Time and Check-in

All participants should arrive before registration. See individual programs for specific schedule information.  The check-in location for AFY will be in room 127 of the Manwaring Center. OYA will meet outside in the circle drive by the BYU-Idaho Center. And EFY will meet in the Auxiliary Gym room 208 of the Hart Building. Group assignments and other program information will be given at Registration.  An orientation shortly follows to answer questions, review the agenda, standards, and other pertinent information.

Parking

Temporary parking for AFY and OYA participants is available in the stalls south of the BYU-Idaho Center. The parking lot west of the stadium is available for EFY participants. These lots are only available during check-in and check-out time and are not available for overnight or long-term parking.

Youth are not allowed to use personal vehicles during the program. However, if a participant requires parking during the week, he or she should request a parking pass when checking in and should only park in designated lots to avoid fines.

Departure

Programs end at various times. See individual programs for specific schedule information. Please make sure proper arrangements for traveling home have been made.

Shuttle Services

BYU-Idaho Shuttle Service

Community Connections offers a shuttle service between the Idaho Falls Airport and the BYU-Idaho campus for participants arriving by plane.

Arrival Shuttles (Idaho Falls Airport Only)

  • Monday - 12:30 p.m. (AFY, OYA, and EFY)

Departure Shuttles (Idaho Falls Airport Only)

  • Friday - 3:30 p.m. (AFY and OYA-will wait for OYA bus)
  • Saturday - 7 a.m. (EFY)

Shuttle fees are $20 per person each way. The deadline for shuttle reservations is one week prior to the program start date. A reservation is required to ensure shuttle service.

Shuttle Service from Salt Lake City, Utah

  • Salt Lake Express (Best Schedule for AFY and OYA)
    (800) 356-9796
    Salt Lake Express Website

Salt Lake Express operates a special early Monday morning shuttle for AFY, EFY, & OYA in addition to their regular Salt Lake City departures. This early shuttle departs from the west side of the LDS Conference Center at 7:30 a.m. and from the Salt Lake Airport at 8 a.m. each Monday. This shuttle is scheduled to arrive at BYU-Idaho at 12:35 p.m.  If you make your reservation online, enter the Discount Code of ZAFY12 or ZEFY12 to receive special pricing each way. This price is only valid for AFY, OYA, and EFY participants.

Nationwide

Greyhound Bus Lines Website
